```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE,
                      echo = FALSE,
                      dev.args = list(bg="transparent"))

library(tidyverse)
library(rio)
library(here)
library(colorblindr)
library(gghighlight)
library(forcats)
library(ggrepel)


diaper <- import(here("data", "fiona_diaper.sav"),
               setclass = "tbl_df") %>% 
               characterize() %>% 
               janitor::clean_names() 


feed <- import(here("data", "fiona_feed.sav"),
               setclass = "tbl_df") %>% 
               characterize() %>% 
               janitor::clean_names() 



```


```{r data explore, include=TRUE}
head(diaper)

head(feed)


mean_feed_duration <- feed %>% 
  summarize(mean(feeding_duration))

feed %>% 
  count(feeding)
  
```
